definition: all the grains/every kind of cereal crop

sentences.english: Rivers and seas can become the kings of valleys because the excel in taking the low position.
sentences.chinese: 江海所以能为百谷王者，以其善下之。

sentences.english: It originated from the ancient saying that "rain gives life to all grains".
sentences.chinese: 谷雨源自古人“雨生百谷”之说。

definition: five crops, e.g. millet 粟[su4], soybean 豆[dou4], sesame 麻[ma2], barley 麥|麦[mai4], rice 稻[dao4] or other variants/all crops/all grains/oats, peas, beans and barley
Shennong or Farmer God (c. 2000 BC), first of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] and creator of agriculture in China/followers or clan of Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2]
Shennong or Farmer God (c. 2000 BC), first of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] and creator of agriculture
miscellany of writing from the Western Han (aka Former Han)
six domestic animals, namely: pig, cow, sheep, horse, chicken and dog
another name for 伏羲[Fu2 Xi1], consort of 女媧|女娲[Nu:3 wa1]
not miss the farming season/do farm work in the right season
the Yellow Emperor, mythological emperor of China, reigned c. 2697-2597 BC
